title: Cracker Jack font
content:
I know it was a customized deal...but can anyone think of a font that looks similar to the font used on Cracker Jack packages?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150122201850im_/http:/typophile.com/files/crackerJack_6517.jpg)
author: DizyDevil

comments.content:
[ITC Clearface Black](http://web.archive.org/web/20150122201850/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/itc-clearface/) has some similarity in look and feel, I think. You might enlarge the lower case c to make the initial C and get a closer look.

- Mike Yanega
